trans-unit.source: Provides mappings between .NET Framework Web service methods and Web Services Description Language (WSDL) messages that are defined for SOAP Web services.
trans-unit.target: 提供 SOAP Web 服務的.NET Framework Web 服務方法和 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 定義的訊息之間的對應。

trans-unit.source: The XmlMembersMapping class is not used directly.
trans-unit.target: XmlMembersMapping 類別不會直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is used: - By the Wsdl.exe tool, or the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會使用:-Wsdl.exe 工具或<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter>類別，從 WSDL 文件產生用戶端 proxy 類別或抽象伺服器類別時。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter>

trans-unit.source: The WSDL document specifies use of the SOAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 文件指定的 SOAP 通訊協定的使用。

trans-unit.source: - To initialize <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> objects while the .NET Framework is initializing a SOAP Web service or client.
trans-unit.target: -若要初始化<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>當.NET Framework 正在初始化 SOAP Web 服務或用戶端物件。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: - By the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> class while creating <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects from classes that are identified as SOAP Web services.
trans-unit.target: X<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>類別建立時<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>從識別為 SOAP Web 服務類別的物件。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>

trans-unit.source: The XmlMembersMapping class is a substitute for the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> class for mapping between Web service methods and messages.
trans-unit.target: XmlMembersMapping 類別的替代方案<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>類別進行 Web 服務方法和訊息之間的對應。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>

trans-unit.source: It is used to contain any of the following entities belonging to a SOAP Web service method: - Input parameters.
trans-unit.target: 它用來包含任何下列的實體屬於 SOAP Web 服務方法︰ 為輸入參數。

trans-unit.source: - Output parameters and return value.
trans-unit.target: 輸出參數和傳回值。

trans-unit.source: - Request SOAP headers.
trans-unit.target: -要求 SOAP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: - Response SOAP headers.
trans-unit.target: -回應 SOAP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the class represents mappings for a WSDL message definition, according to the following choices: - For a Web service method that uses SOAP encoding: The top-level <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping.ElementName%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeName%2A> properties pertain to a parent, wrapper element; the message parts are represented by array members.
trans-unit.target: 具體而言，此類別代表對應 WSDL 訊息定義，請根據下列選項:-如果要讓 Web 服務方法使用 SOAP 編碼︰ 最上層<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping.ElementName%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeName%2A>與父代，包裝函式項目有關的屬性，則為訊息部分都由陣列的成員。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeName%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping.ElementName%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, in the rare case when the Web service operation uses document style combined with a wrapped binding to a .NET Framework method plus SOAP encoding, the top-level <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping.ElementName%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeName%2A> properties pertain to the single **part** element that appears in a generated WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在極少數的情況下，如果 Web 服務作業會使用與.NET Framework 方法再加上 SOAP 編碼，最上層的包裝繫結結合的文件樣式<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping.ElementName%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeName%2A>屬性適用於單一**一部分**產生的 WSDL 文件中出現的項目。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeName%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping.ElementName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - For a Web service method that makes literal use of XML Schema definitions: If a Web service message or operation uses a wrapped binding to a .NET Framework method or merely defines a single message part, the top-level <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping.ElementName%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeName%2A> properties pertain to the part.
trans-unit.target: -若為 Web 服務使用的 XML 結構描述定義讓常值的方法︰ 如果 Web 服務訊息或作業會使用包裝的繫結至.NET Framework 方法或只是在定義的最上層<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping.ElementName%2A><xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeName%2A>與組件有關的屬性</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeName%2A>和</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping.ElementName%2A>單一訊息部分

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple parts (the atypical case), the top-level <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping.ElementName%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeName%2A> properties pertain to a parent, wrapper element; the parts are represented by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping.Count%2A> and indexed array access properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個部分 （非典型的情況），最上層<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping.ElementName%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeName%2A>與父代，包裝函式項目有關的屬性; 組件由<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping.Count%2A>和索引的陣列存取屬性。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping.Count%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeName%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping.ElementName%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the XSD `any` element receives special treatment.
trans-unit.target: 此外，XSD`any`項目收到特殊處理。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of .NET Framework code entities that belong to a Web service method to which a SOAP message is being mapped.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬於 Web 服務方法的 SOAP 訊息對應的.NET Framework 程式碼實體數目。

trans-unit.source: The collection can contain of any of the following: - Web service method input parameters.
trans-unit.target: 集合可能會包含下列任何一項:-Web 服務方法的輸入參數。

trans-unit.source: - Web service method output parameters, plus 1 for the return type, if not void.
trans-unit.target: -Web 服務方法輸出參數，加上 1 的傳回型別，如果不是 void。

trans-unit.source: - SOAP input headers.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 輸入標頭。

trans-unit.source: - SOAP output headers.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 標頭的輸出。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> class for the conditions under which these entities translate to `part` elements in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>類別有關的條件，這些實體轉譯為`part`Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件中的項目。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>

trans-unit.source: The number of mappings in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的對應的數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets an item that contains internal type mapping information for a .NET Framework code entity that belongs to a Web service method being mapped to a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含內部類型的項目對應至 Web 服務方法對應到 SOAP 訊息所屬的.NET Framework 程式碼實體的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The indexed array access operator for the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> class gets a specified entry from an array of any of the following: - Web service method input parameters.
trans-unit.target: 索引的陣列存取運算子<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>類別會取得指定的項目從陣列中的下列任一項:-Web 服務方法的輸入參數。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>

trans-unit.source: - Web service method output parameters, plus the return type, if not void, at index 0.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務方法輸出參數，加上傳回的型別，如果不 void，位於索引 0。

trans-unit.source: - SOAP input headers.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 輸入標頭。

trans-unit.source: - SOAP output headers.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 標頭的輸出。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> class for the conditions under which these entities translate to `part` elements in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>類別有關的條件，這些實體轉譯為`part`Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件中的項目。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>

trans-unit.source: The index of the mapping to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之對應的索引。

trans-unit.source: The requested <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要求<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the .NET Framework type being mapped to the data type of an XML Schema element that represents a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應到 XML 結構描述項目，表示 SOAP 訊息的資料類型的.NET Framework 型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: A SOAP message is defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document using the `message` element.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件中定義的 SOAP 訊息`message`項目。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> class for the conditions under which the TypeName property refers to a code entity defined in a Web service method (a parameter or return value) instead of to an extra parent or wrapper element.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>所在的 TypeName 屬性是指 Web 服務方法 （參數或傳回值） 而不是額外的父代或包裝函式項目中定義的程式碼實體之條件的類別。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>

trans-unit.source: The name of the .NET Framework type.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace of the .NET Framework type being mapped to the data type of an XML Schema element that represents a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應到 XML 結構描述項目，表示 SOAP 訊息的資料類型的.NET Framework 類型的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A SOAP message is defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document using the `message` element.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件中定義的 SOAP 訊息`message`項目。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework namespace of the mapping.
trans-unit.target: 對應的.NET Framework 命名空間。
